page.title: 12Morris Dancing, Eccleston
page.content:
We go to practise on Thursday.I am in thejuniors.There are three different teams.The tinies are called Eccleston Rosebuds,the juniors are called Eccleston Imperials and the seniors are called Eccleston Belvederes.There are about twelve in each team.All the girls in each team have to wear the same dresses.The colours of Eccleston are pink and green.Each team must have a leader and may also have a mascot. Most weekends we go to competitions or carnivals in different places.We wear a bow in our hair and we have pink and white shakers.We must wear clean white pumps with bells and pink bows on them, and all wear identical socks.
Rachel,aged 9
